name: Amano Pikamee Locon LORAs
description:
This is a model dedicated to the Vtuber Amano Pikamee

This is a LORA made with the Locon method implemented by KohakuBlueLeaf you'll need to install this extension into your webui to use this LORAs

https://github.com/KohakuBlueleaf/a1111-sd-webui-locon

Triggertokens: normpika (for her original outfit)/dinopika (for her kaiju hoodie costume)/isekaipika (for her isekai costume)

This model was trained with minimal pruning with the tagging data so if the trigger tokens are not enough to summon the full outfit you'll need these tags

normpika: sharp teeth, blonde hair, multicolored hair, off-shoulder shirt, black hairband, white shirt, two-tone hair, bright pupils, white pupils, collarbone, bangs, bare shoulders, green eyes, black shorts, hair between eyes, short hair, nail polish, aqua nails, wide sleeves, aqua hair, aqua eyes, spaghetti strap

dinopika: green hoodie, sharp teeth, hood, hoodie, blonde hair, tail, green hair, multicolored hair, looking at viewer, white pupils, two-tone hair, blush stickers, bright pupils, nail polish, green eyes, green nails, hair between eyes, twintails, long sleeves, hood up, bangs

isekaipika: blonde hair, green eyes, multicolored hair, green hair, hair bun, long sleeves, teeth, two-tone hair, hairband, double bun, hair ornament, streaked hair, green shirt, two side up, bow, puffy long sleeves, dress, puffy sleeves, frills, green dress, bangs, star hair ornament, skirt, star (symbol), shirt, black hairband

CC License:

https://mega.nz/file/qExmQBQA#9eyI78TMEJu8V4c84UWitrlDAjyqxrxSVc1D5ktb87k
